processingCommand.script:
:SET &DB_HOSTNAME_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DB_HOSTNAME_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &DB_FREEZE_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DB_FREEZE_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &GET_DB_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,GET_DB_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &DB_SWITCH_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DB_SWITCH_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &DB_CONUPDT_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DB_CONUPDT_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &RPTABUPDATE_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,RPTABUPDATE_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &TZ# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,TIME_ZONE,1)

:PUB &DB_HOSTNAME_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &DB_FREEZE_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &GET_DB_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &DB_SWITCH_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &DB_CONUPDT_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &RPTABUPDATE_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &TZ# 

:SET &RUN_ID#      = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR()
:SET &RUN_ID#      = FORMAT(&RUN_ID#)
!:PUBLISH &RUN_ID#,,WORKFLOW

! INC/CTASK
:SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""

:IF &TICKET# = "null"
:  SET &TICKET# = ""
:  PUBLISH &TICKET#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:IF &TICKET# <> ""
:  SET &INC# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,3)
:  SET &CTA# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,5)
:  IF &INC# = "INC"
:    SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "INC"
:  ELSE
:    IF &CTA# = "CTASK"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "CTASK"
:    ELSE
:      PRINT "WARNING - No valid INC/CTASK!"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""
:    ENDIF
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &TICKET_TYPE#

! Get current time and date
:SET &TIME_NOW#  = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS","&TZ#")
:SET &DATE_NOW#  = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL("YYYY-MM-DD","&TZ#")
:PUBLISH &TIME_NOW#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DATE_NOW#,,WORKFLOW


:SET &REST_MODULES# = "WMS,REFS,RW,EMS"
:PUBLISH &REST_MODULES#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &REST_MODULES_DB# = "WMS,REFS,EMS"
:PUBLISH &REST_MODULES_DB#,,WORKFLOW

! Datacenters
:SET &P_DATACENTER# = GET_VAR(DIRECTION.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, &DIRECTION#, 2)
:SET &S_DATACENTER# = GET_VAR(DIRECTION.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, &DIRECTION#, 3)
:PUBLISH &P_DATACENTER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &S_DATACENTER#,,WORKFLOW

! Direction message
:DEFINE &ADIR#, string, 2
:FILL &ADIR#[] = STR_SPLIT(&DIRECTION#, "_")
:SET &TARGET_DATACENTER# = &ADIR#[2]
:PUB &TARGET_DATACENTER#
:IF &TARGET_DATACENTER# = &S_DATACENTER#
:  SET &DIRECTION_MESSAGE# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "DIRECTION_MESSAGE", 1)
:ELSE
:  SET &DIRECTION_MESSAGE# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "DIRECTION_MESSAGE", 2)
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &DIRECTION_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW

! Type message
:IF &DR_TESTING# = "Y"
:  SET &TYPE_MESSAGE# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "TYPE_MESSAGE", 1)
:ELSE
:  SET &TYPE_MESSAGE# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "TYPE_MESSAGE", 2)
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &TYPE_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW

! Instance name uppercase
:SET &INSTANCE_NAME_UC# = STR_UC(&INSTANCE_NAME#)
:PUBLISH &INSTANCE_NAME_UC#,,WORKFLOW

! Restart type
:SET &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER", 1)
:PUBLISH &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER#,,WORKFLOW

! Login
:SET &MODULE_LOGIN# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "LOGIN", 1)
:PUBLISH &MODULE_LOGIN#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS# = ""
:PUBLISH &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &ZABBIX_MAINTENANCESID# = ""
:PUBLISH &ZABBIX_MAINTENANCESID#,,WORKFLOW

! Event Assignment Group
:IF &CHILD_SERVICE# = "JDA WM - TEST"
:  SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.#DSC-WM-LATAM#.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP", 1)
:  SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = ""
:ELSE
:  SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.#DSC-WM-LATAM#.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP_PROD", 1)
:  SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.#DSC-WM-LATAM#.V, "PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE", 1)
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW

! RPTAB check
:SET &CHECK_RPTAB# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CHECK_RPTAB", 1)
:PUBLISH &CHECK_RPTAB#,,WORKFLOW

! Incident Site Update
:SET &INC_SITE_UPDATE# = "false"
:PUBLISH &INC_SITE_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
